sense.gloss: stoppage, coming to a stop, halt, standstill
ceasing (movement, activity, etc.), suspension (of operations), interruption (e.g. of electricity supply), cutting off
suspension (of payment, a licence, etc.), (temporary) prohibition, ban
suspension of music, dance, etc. as a sign of mourning for a prominent person

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑次↑↓つぎ↓の↑昇任↑↓しょうにん↓↑予定↑↓よ|てい↓↑者↑↓し|ゃ↓です。

sdata.e: It is no use your trying to deny it.

sdata.j: ↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓のため、↑母親↑↓ははおや↓と↑息子↑↓むすこ↓の↑近親↑↓きんしん↓↑相姦↑↓そうかん↓が↑黙認↑↓もくにん↓されている↑部族↑↓ぶぞく↓↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓を↑仮定↑↓か|てい↓し|てみよう。
